fullName.jp: イグニス・スキエンティア

description.jp: ルシス王家の執事の家系に生まれノクティスの側付きとしてともに育った冷静沈着な青年。誰よりも近くでノクティスを支えながら自身の研鑽をつづける生真面目な努力家。優れた知性と頭脳の冴えを駆使して旅では参謀の役割を果たす。
description.gl: A cool and collected young man born into a line of retainers to the royal family, raised to ever be by Noctis's side. Endeavors to improve himself all the while supporting the prince. Thanks to his keen wisdom and intellect, he fulfills his duties admirably during the party's travels.

jp.text: 人類史上 初の快挙\nかもしれないな

gl.text: Well、 well. You kept us waiting.
After an infinite regression、 we arrived at an answer: the turtle's all the way down.

name.gl: コールアビリティ_イグニス
name.jp: コールアビリティ_イグニス

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Regroup (C)]
• Increases HP recovered by 20%
• Increases BRV gain based on total party HP by 20%
• Call Effect +10%
rank_up_desc.gl:
When using Regroup (C):
 • Slight boost to HP recovered based on individual MAX HP
 • Slight boost to BRV granted to allies (calling character excluded) based on party's current total HP
 • Slight special effect boost after use
rank_up_desc.jp:
「ギャザリング【C】」使用時
・それぞれの最大HP依存のHP回復量小アップ
・コールしたキャラクターを除く味方全員の
　現在HPの合計に依存したBRV加算量小アップ
・使用後特殊効果の効果小アップ

name.gl: LDコールアビリティ_イグニス
name.jp: LDコールアビリティ_イグニス

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [SageFire (C)]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 8
• Increases total BRV potency by 80%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• Added to Call Effect
　∟ Increases Party's Elemental Weakness damage dealt by %
rank_up_desc.gl:
When using Sagefire (C):
 • BRV  attack hit count becomes 8; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Adds effect to special effect that slightly raises party's damage dealt when attacking elemental weakness after use
rank_up_desc.jp:
「賢者の炎【C】」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が8HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・使用後特殊効果に
　味方全員の属性弱点ダメージ小アップの効果追加

desc.en:
Increases party's BRV by 10% of Max BRV
Self: 3 turns [Ambrosia]
No Action Delay

[BRV Attack] becomes [Dishes (Memory Lane Pastry)]
　∟ Increases party's BRV by 100% of Initial BRV
　∟ Self: 6 turns [Memory Lane Pastry]
　∟ Cancels [Papa Bird & Baby Bowl]
　∟ No Action Delay
　∟ Does not increase turn count
　∟ Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

[HP Attack] becomes [Dishes (Papa Bird & Baby Bowl)]
　∟ Increases party's BRV by 30% of Max BRV
　∟ Self: 6 turns [Papa Bird & Baby Bowl]
　∟ Cancels [Memory Lane Pastry]
　∟ No Action Delay
　∟ Does not increase turn count
　∟ Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

[Memory Lane Pastry]
• Raises party's debuff Evasion Rate by 100%
• Restores party's HP by 10% of individual Max HP

[Papa Bird & Baby Bowl]
• Raises party's Attack by 40%
• Raises party's stolen BRV overflow limit by 20%

desc.en:
When using [Quick Recipeh]
• Increases BRV gain based on Max BRV by 10%
• [Ambrosia] duration +4

When [Memory Lane Pastry] is active
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+ (Pastry)]
　∟ Increases party's BRV by 70% of Initial BRV
• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+ (Pastry)]
　∟ Increases own BRV by 100% of Initial BRV before HP attack
　∟ Increases allies' BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt

When [Papa Bird & Baby Bowl] is active
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+ (P&B Bowl)]
　∟ Increases party's BRV by 10% of Max BRV before BRV attacks
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 100%
　∟ Lowers Action Delay to 22
• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+ (P&B Bowl)]
　∟ Increases party's BRV by 20% of Max BRV before BRV attack
　∟ Melee BRV attack + HP attack (BRV potency 120%)
　∟ Lowers Action Delay to 22
desc.gl:
When using Quick Recipeh:
 • Slight boost to BRV granted based on own MAX BRV
 • Ambrosia duration +4

While Memory Lane Pastry active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Pastry) (removes BRV attack; grants party BRV based on own INT BRV)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Pastry) (increases BRV based on INT BRV before HP attack; grants allies BRV based on HP damage dealt)

While Papa Bird & Baby Bowl active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (P&B Bowl) (grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV before BRV attack; BRV attack hit count becomes 2; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage; higher turn rate)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (P&B Bowl) (grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV before attack; melee BRV attack + HP attack; higher turn rate)
desc.jp:
「神速クッキング」使用時
・自身の最大BRV依存のBRV加算量小アップ
・「饌玉炊金」の4ACTION期間延長

「おもいでのお菓子」付与中
・通常「BRV攻撃」が以下の「BRV攻撃＋（お菓子）」に変化
　-BRV攻撃がなくなり
　　味方全員に自身の初期BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
